articles.title: Fauci: US might 'still have polio' if media back then opposed vaccine - The Australian
articles.description: Top US scientist Anthony Fauci on Saturday blasted commentators who sound an anti-vaccination theme, saying America might still be battling smallpox and polio if today's kind of misinformation existed back then.
articles.content:

articles.title: Canadian government approaches reopening border for fully vaccinated Americans - CBC.ca
articles.description: As the government looks to a possible mid-August reopening of the U.S. border for fully vaccinated travellers, people affected are still looking for details, such as whether the U.S. will reciprocate.
